Title: Down by the River
Writer: Hunt Baldwin, John Coveny, Hunt Baldwin (developed for television by), John Coveny (developed for television by), Craig Johnson (based upon the "Walt Longmire Mysteries" book series by)
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Cassidy Freeman
Plot: In the wake of discovering a dead body in the river from a supposed suicide, Walt soon discovers evidence pointing to murder. Walt makes it his mission to bring Nighthorse to justice.
